author: huyenltnguyen
message: feat(curriculum): add Chinese and Spanish help categories to challenge schema (#63597)

files.patch:
@@ -212,7 +212,9 @@ const schema = Joi.object().keys({
     'English',
     'Odin',

-    'Rosetta'
+    'Rosetta',
+    'Chinese Curriculum',
+    'Spanish Curriculum'
   ).required(),
   isLastChallengeInBlock: Joi.boolean().required(),
   videoUrl: Joi.string().allow(''),
